powershell.codeFormatting.whitespaceBefo: Adds a space between a keyword and its associated scriptblock expression.
Adds a space between a keyword (if, elseif, while, switch, etc) and its associated conditional expression.
powershell.codeFormatting.whitespaceArou: Adds spaces before and after an operator ('=', '+', '-', etc.).
powershell.codeFormatting.whitespaceAfte: Adds a space after a separator (',' and ';').
powershell.codeFormatting.whitespaceInsi: Adds a space after an opening brace ('{') and before a closing brace ('}').
powershell.codeFormatting.addWhitespaceA: Adds a space before and after the pipeline operator ('|') if it is missing.
powershell.codeFormatting.trimWhitespace: Trims extraneous whitespace (more than 1 character) before and after the pipeline operator ('|').
powershell.codeFormatting.ignoreOneLineB: Does not reformat one-line code blocks, such as "if (...) {...} else {...}".
powershell.codeFormatting.alignPropertyV: Align assignment statements in a hashtable or a DSC Configuration.
